pullRequest.title: Validate alias operations don't target data streams
pullRequest.bodyText:
This adds validation to make sure alias operations (add, remove, remove index)
don't target data streams or the backing indices.
Relates to #53100

nodes.bodyText: Minor error message suggestion -- I think "aliases driven operations" should be either "alias-driven operations" or just "alias operations." I prefer the latter as it's simple and clear.
